predicate.note: Frames file for 'misstate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: pasive
example.text: The date was misstated [*-1] in Friday 's edition .

example.name: transitive
example.text: Neither technique is perfect , but both are better than the current system , which [*T*-1] misstates the costs of new credit programs by amounts that [*T*-2] vary substantially and average about $ 20 billion [*U*] annually , according to the Congressional Budget Office .
example.arg: the costs of new credit programs
by amounts that [*T*-2] vary substantially and average about $ 20 billion [*U*] annually
